incorrectResponse: Nice try, but missed. Let's try again

questions.q: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
questions.backgroundStory: Albert Einstein, one of the greatest minds of our time, once said, “Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited to all we now know and understand, while imagination embraces the entire world, and all there ever will be to know and understand.”
